purpose: This email is a call for papers for a special issue on Responsible Artificial Intelligence in the journal Information Processing & Management.
evidence_sentences: This special issue seeks to bring together cutting-edge research, methodologies, and critical reflections on Responsible Artificial Intelligence (RAI).
As AI technologies permeate decision-making across industry, government, and society, the demand for systems that are fair, accountable, transparent, and trustworthy has never been more urgent.
Submissions are welcome on (but not limited to) the following topics:
We invite original, high-quality submissions that contribute substantively to the field of Responsible AI.
